cgcloud__Substitution__c.name: cgcloud__Substitution__c
cgcloud__Substitution__c.description: The use case stores the details of the substitute object that specifies the basis of a substitution depending on a substitution period and user.

LastActivityDate.description: The date when a user last did something related to the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Follow_Up_Time__c.description: Follow up time (number of days) of the substitution.

cgcloud__Lead_Time__c.description: Lead time (number of days) of the substitution.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the substitution detail page.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the substitution belongs.

cgcloud__Substituted__c.description: Reference to the user for whom the substitution is planned.

cgcloud__Substitution__c.description: Reference to the substitution with which the substitution item record is related.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: First date of validity period of the customer substitution.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Last date of validity period of the customer substitution.
